eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.engine

Class OutputWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.engine.OutputWriter

  • public class OutputWriter
extends Object
    Auxiliary class that can be used to write search results to a file in CSV format.

    • Method Detail

      • isSet

        public boolean isSet()
        Indicates whether an output stream has been specified for writing search results in CSV format
        Returns:
        True, if the output stream has been defined; otherwise, False.

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the output writer.

      • writeResults

        public void writeResults(Double[] weights,
                         IResult[] results)
        Writes the search results into the CSV file.
        Parameters:
        weights - The weights applied to the specified batch of results. These weights will become the first column in the output CSV file.
        results - Output results as received from the rank aggregation process (for a given combination of weights).
